para.text: Method of Measurement of Bending Dimensions
Total Length of Bar (L) Measured Along centre line
If angle with horizontal is 45° or less, and R is 12d or less
is specified, A & E is omitted

body.para: Where, C should be greater than 3 times diameter of Bar.
